data.text:
Boris Grinchenko Kyiv University In-service Teacher Training Institute Director Deputy Director for Coordination and Methodology Deputy Director for Studying and Methodology Deputy Director for Research and Methodology ACADEMIC DEPARTMENT ORGANIZATIONAL DEPARTMENT The Department of Preschool and Primary Education Teaching Methodology and Psychology The Department of Science and Mathematics and Technologies Teaching Methods The Department of Languages and Literature Teaching Methods The Department of Social and Human Studies Teaching Methods CRTM of Science and Mathematics CRTM of Preschool and Primary Education CRTM of Ukrainian Language and Literature SMC of Social and Ukrainian Studies CRTM of Health, Sports and Esthetics CRTM of Technologies SMC of Civic Education CRTM of Foreign Languages and World Literature Common Institute CRTM and SRL CRTM of Independent External Testing CRTM of Information Technologies CRTM of Practical Psychology CRTM of Inclusive Education CRTM of Coordination of Teacher Development Research Laboratory of Experiments and Innovations in Pedagogy

Boris Grinchenko Kyiv University In-service Teacher Training Institute ITTI provides annual • teacher developmentcourses for preschool, comprehensive and vocational school teachers numbered over 6800 people in 58 specialties of full-time, part-time and distance education • coordination of teacher development : • 36 subject t city teachers’ associations; • city board of the Heads of DSMC; • 28 original pedagogical centres; • schools of teaching excellence; • Newly-qualifiedteacher schools; • 170 correspondent methodologists • experimental work: • 22 All-Ukrainian experiments – 59 EI(educational institutions); • 62 regional experiments – 161 EI. Professional staff of the ITTI: 47people of academic staff , 45teachers, 6senior science masters

Boris Grinchenko Kyiv University In-service Teacher Training Institute ITTI provides annual • In-service teacher training in the period between courses: • about 300 seminars for 63 teachers’ categories of preschool, comprehensive, vocational and out-of-school education ; • Conferences for research and teaching methods, round tables, webinars, trainings, tutorials. • Methodological support of academic process: • participation in programmesand projects development such as “Me in the World”, “A Child”, “The Open World”, “Metropolitan Education Standard”, “The Education of Kyiv”, “Inclusion Index”; • curriculum development for primary school, Chemistry, Biology, History, Ukrainian, Russian, English, Mathematics, Handicraft; • coursebooksand workbooks design: 32 national and 18 regional coursebooks, about 100 teaching aids are issued annually; • piloting of coursebooksand teaching aids; • preparing materials for the State Final Certification and Independent External Testing.

Tournaments 14 tournaments in different subjects and fields Over 5000 participants Boris Grinchenko Kyiv University In-service Teacher Training Institute Academic Olympics 21 All-Ukrainian Academic Olympics; 8 metropolitan Olympics Over 15000 participants Competitions 18 competitions “The Teacher of the Year”, “The Form Master of the Year”, “School Librarian”, “Health School”, “Innovator School” Over 400 participants
